sentences.en: A newspaper ran an editorial attacking him for being a showman.
sentences.cn: 一家报纸发表社论，批评他善于作秀。

sentences.en: After the show the showman began to make dinner.
sentences.cn: 节目表演完后,团主开始做晚餐.

sentences.en: Don't cry like that. It makes me feel sad, shouted the showman.
sentences.cn: “别哭成那个样子, 听了教人伤心, ”团主叫道.

sentences.en: Everyone was something of a showman.
sentences.cn: 人人都是主持演出的人.

sentences.en: For most of his career, Iverson has been quintessential, high - scoring offensive showman.
sentences.cn: 职业生涯的多数时候,他都是扮演着疯狂得分王的角色.

sentences.en: He is the band’s best showman.
sentences.cn: 他是这支乐队中风头最盛的人。

sentences.en: He was a master showman, and he knew human nature.
sentences.cn: 他有表演的人格, 他懂得人情.

sentences.en: He was a showman, an extrovert who revelled in controversy.
sentences.cn: 他是个爱出风头、性格外向而且喜欢争论的人。

sentences.en: He's always been a bit of a showman , ie fond of drawing attention to himself.
I will deal with you later, the showman shouted.
sentences.cn: “等一下再来对付你,”团主叫道.

sentences.en: If everyone was something of a showman, nobody ultimately was victimized.
sentences.cn: 假如人人都是主持演出的人, 最终就不会有人上当了.

sentences.en: In local politics it helps to be a bit of a showman.
sentences.cn: 在地方政治中,会赢得公众的注意有助于成功.

sentences.en: The next morning the showman gave Pinocchio five gold pieces and sent him on his way.
sentences.cn: 隔天早上,团主给了皮诺奇五枚金币并送他上路.

sentences.en: The showman took pity on the mischievous puppet and let him go.
sentences.cn: 团主同情这顽皮的木偶并放他走.

sentences.en: There was no doubt, lurking somewhere in him, a touch of the spirit of the showman.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 在他身上潜伏着那么一点滑稽演员的气质.

sentences.en: Though he was often shy in social settings, science brought out the showman in him.
sentences.cn: 虽然在大庭广众面前他还常常感到害羞, 但科学使他的表演天赋得以充分发挥.

words.tran_cn: 表演技巧；吸引观众的窍门
因特别精彩而被掌声打断的表演
玩杂耍的人；马戏团的老板；表演者

trans.tran_cn: （戏剧、音乐、文娱表演等的）演出主持人，娱乐经理人，善于引起公众注意的人物，爱出风头的人物
